long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep track of github PRs.


Add your github personal access token and you can use this to store a list of github PRs.
Be able to quickly view the number of comments, if it's approved, and the build status. 
Be able to quickly open the PR or the repository and the link to the build. 

Please create a Github Token with all of the `repo` scope permissions. The token will only be used and stored locally on your machine. 

https://docs.github.com/en/authentication/keeping-your-account-and-data-secure/creating-a-personal-access-token
